arcane_subtlety.description: Reduces threat generated by Arcane spells by 20% per point

arcane_focus.name: Arcane Focus
arcane_focus.description: Increases hit chance with Arcane spells by 1% per point

arcane_concentration.name: Arcane Concentration
arcane_concentration.description: Gives a 2% chance per point to enter a Clearcasting state after a spell hits

arcane_impact.name: Arcane Impact
arcane_impact.description: Increases critical strike chance of Arcane Blast and Arcane Explosion by 2% per point

arcane_meditation.name: Arcane Meditation
arcane_meditation.description: Allows 10% of mana regeneration to continue while casting per point

presence_of_mind.name: Presence of Mind
presence_of_mind.description: When activated, your next spell with a cast time less than 10 seconds becomes instant cast

arcane_power.name: Arcane Power
arcane_power.description: When activated, you deal 30% more spell damage but all spells cost 30% more mana

improved_fireball.name: Improved Fireball
improved_fireball.description: Reduces cast time of Fireball by 0.1s per point

ignite.name: Ignite
ignite.description: Your critical strikes with Fire spells deal an additional 8% damage over 4 seconds per point

flame_throwing.name: Flame Throwing
flame_throwing.description: Increases range of Fire spells by 3 yards per point

pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
pyroblast.description: Hurls an immense fiery boulder dealing massive damage and additional fire damage over 12 seconds

blast_wave.name: Blast Wave
blast_wave.description: A wave of flame radiates from the caster, dealing fire damage and slowing enemies by 50% for 6 seconds

combustion.name: Combustion
combustion.description: When activated, each fire damage spell you cast increases your critical strike chance with Fire spells by 10%

improved_frostbolt.name: Improved Frostbolt
improved_frostbolt.description: Reduces cast time of Frostbolt by 0.1s per point

ice_shards.name: Ice Shards
ice_shards.description: Increases critical strike damage of Frost spells by 33% per point

piercing_ice.name: Piercing Ice
piercing_ice.description: Increases the damage of your Frost spells by 2% per point

icy_veins.name: Icy Veins
icy_veins.description: Increases spell casting speed by 20% and prevents pushback for 20 seconds

ice_block.name: Ice Block
ice_block.description: You become encased in a block of ice, protecting you from all physical and spell damage for 10 seconds

ice_barrier.name: Ice Barrier
ice_barrier.description: Shields you from damage, absorbing a large amount of physical and spell damage

malice.name: Malice
malice.description: Increases critical strike chance by 1% per point

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Backstab, and Mutilate by 6% per point

cold_blood.name: Cold Blood
cold_blood.description: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next offensive ability by 100%

mutilate.name: Mutilate
mutilate.description: Instantly attacks with both weapons, dealing 120% weapon damage

lightning_reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
lightning_reflexes.description: Increases dodge chance by 1% per point

deflection.name: Deflection
deflection.description: Increases parry chance by 1% per point

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description: A strike that deals 100% weapon damage and disarms the target for 6 seconds after parrying

blade_flurry.name: Blade Flurry
blade_flurry.description: Increases attack speed by 20% and attacks strike an additional nearby opponent for 15 seconds

adrenaline_rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
adrenaline_rush.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 seconds

killing_spree.name: Killing Spree
killing_spree.description: Step through the shadows from enemy to enemy, attacking 5 times for 100% weapon damage

master_of_deception.name: Master of Deception
master_of_deception.description: Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Stealthed

opportunity.name: Opportunity
opportunity.description: Increases damage of Backstab and Garrote by 4% per point

improved_corruption.name: Improved Corruption
improved_corruption.description: Reduces cast time of Corruption by 0.4s per point

suppression.name: Suppression
suppression.description: Increases hit chance with Affliction spells by 1% per point

siphon_life.name: Siphon Life
siphon_life.description: Transfers health from the enemy to the warlock every 3 seconds

unstable_affliction.name: Unstable Affliction
unstable_affliction.description: Shadow energy slowly destroys the target, dealing damage over 15 seconds. If dispelled, causes massive damage and silences

haunt.name: Haunt
haunt.description: Sends a ghost to haunt the target, dealing damage and increasing all DoT damage on the target by 20%

improved_imp.name: Improved Imp
improved_imp.description: Increases damage and effects of your Imp by 10% per point

fel_guard.name: Summon Felguard
fel_guard.description: Summons a powerful Felguard to aid the Warlock

metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
metamorphosis.description: Transforms into a Demon for 30 seconds, increasing damage by 20% and armor by 600%

improved_shadow_bolt.name: Improved Shadow Bolt
improved_shadow_bolt.description: Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes increase shadow damage taken by the target by 4% for 12s

cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
cataclysm.description: Reduces mana cost of Destruction spells by 1% per point

shadow_burn.name: Shadowburn
shadow_burn.description: Instantly blasts the target for shadow damage

conflagrate.name: Conflagrate
conflagrate.description: Ignites an Immolate or Unstable Affliction effect on the enemy, dealing instant fire damage

chaos_bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
chaos_bolt.description: Sends a bolt of chaotic fire that deals massive damage and cannot be resisted

improved_aspect_of_the_hawk.name: Improved Aspect of the Hawk
improved_aspect_of_the_hawk.description: While Aspect of the Hawk is active, ranged attacks have a 10% chance to increase ranged haste by 15% for 12s

endurance_training.name: Endurance Training
endurance_training.description: Increases Pet health by 2% and your health by 1% per point

unleashed_fury.name: Unleashed Fury
unleashed_fury.description: Increases the damage dealt by your pets by 4% per point

ferocity.name: Ferocity
ferocity.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 2% per point

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.description: Command your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 3 seconds

bestial_wrath.name: Bestial Wrath
bestial_wrath.description: Send your pet into a rage, increasing damage by 50% for 10 seconds

lethal_shots.name: Lethal Shots
lethal_shots.description: Increases ranged critical strike chance by 1% per point

efficiency.name: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Reduces mana cost of shots and stings by 2% per point

mortal_shots.name: Mortal Shots
mortal_shots.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your ranged weapons by 6% per point

aimed_shot.name: Aimed Shot
aimed_shot.description: An aimed shot that deals 150% ranged weapon damage

trueshot_aura.name: Trueshot Aura
trueshot_aura.description: Increases the attack power of party members by 50

monster_slaying.name: Monster Slaying
monster_slaying.description: Increases damage and crit damage against beasts, giants, and dragonkin by 1% per point

humanoid_slaying.name: Humanoid Slaying
humanoid_slaying.description: Increases damage and crit damage against humanoids by 1% per point

surefooted.name: Surefooted
surefooted.description: Increases hit chance by 1% and chance to resist movement impairing effects by 5% per point

deterrence.name: Deterrence
deterrence.description: Increases your Dodge and Parry chance by 25% for 10 seconds

wyvern_sting.name: Wyvern Sting
wyvern_sting.description: Stings the target, putting it to sleep for 12 seconds. After the sleep, deals poison damage over 6 seconds

convection.name: Convection
convection.description: Reduces mana cost of Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Shocks by 2% per point

concussion.name: Concussion
concussion.description: Increases damage of Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Shocks by 1% per point

call_of_flame.name: Call of Flame
call_of_flame.description: Increases damage of Fire Totems and Fire spells by 15% per point

elemental_mastery.name: Elemental Mastery
elemental_mastery.description: When activated, your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell becomes instant and has a 100% crit chance

thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
thunderstorm.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing damage, knocking back enemies and returning 8% mana

ancestral_knowledge.name: Ancestral Knowledge
ancestral_knowledge.description: Increases maximum mana by 1% per point

shield_specialization.name: Shield Specialization
shield_specialization.description: Increases block chance by 1% and block value by 5% per point

flurry.name: Flurry
flurry.description: Increases attack speed by 30% for 3 swings after critical hit

dual_wield.name: Dual Wield
dual_wield.description: Allows one-handed and off-hand weapons to be equipped in the off-hand slot

feral_spirit.name: Feral Spirit
feral_spirit.description: Summons two Spirit Wolves to aid the Shaman for 30 seconds

improved_healing_wave.name: Improved Healing Wave
improved_healing_wave.description: Reduces cast time of Healing Wave by 0.1s per point

tidal_focus.name: Tidal Focus
tidal_focus.description: Reduces mana cost of healing spells by 1% per point

healing_way.name: Healing Way
healing_way.description: Increases amount healed by Healing Wave by 25% per point

mana_tide_totem.name: Mana Tide Totem
mana_tide_totem.description: Summons a Mana Tide Totem that restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to the party

riptide.name: Riptide
riptide.description: Instantly heals the target and additional healing over 15 seconds

improved_wrath.name: Improved Wrath
improved_wrath.description: Reduces cast time of Wrath by 0.1s per point

nature_grasp.name: Nature's Grasp
nature_grasp.description: While active, any enemy hitting the caster has a 35% chance to be rooted

nature_s_grasp.name: Nature's Grasp
nature_s_grasp.description: Gives a 100% chance to entangle enemies that strike the caster

improved_moonfire.name: Improved Moonfire
improved_moonfire.description: Increases damage and critical strike chance of Moonfire by 10% per point

moonfury.name: Moonfury
moonfury.description: Increases damage dealt by Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath by 10% per point

moonkin_form.name: Moonkin Form
moonkin_form.description: Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form, increasing armor by 400% and spell critical strike chance by 5%

starfall.name: Starfall
starfall.description: Calls down stars from the sky, dealing arcane damage to all nearby enemies over 10 seconds

ferocity.name: Ferocity
ferocity.description: Reduces rage/energy cost of Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake by 1 per point

feral_aggression.name: Feral Aggression
feral_aggression.description: Increases damage of Ferocious Bite and Demoralizing Roar effect by 3% per point

feral_instinct.name: Feral Instinct
feral_instinct.description: Increases threat generated in Bear form by 15% per point

feral_swiftness.name: Feral Instinct
feral_swiftness.description: Increases movement speed in Cat form by 30%

mangle.name: Mangle
mangle.description: Mangle the target for 115% weapon damage and increases bleed damage by 30%

improved_mark_of_the_wild.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
improved_mark_of_the_wild.description: Increases effect of Mark of the Wild by 10% per point

furor.name: Furor
furor.description: Gives a 20% chance per point to gain 10 Rage when shifting to Bear or 40 Energy when shifting to Cat

nature_s_swiftness.name: Nature's Swiftness
nature_s_swiftness.description: When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast

tree_of_life.name: Tree of Life
tree_of_life.description: Transforms the Druid into a Tree of Life, increasing healing by 15% and reducing mana cost by 20%

wild_growth.name: Wild Growth
wild_growth.description: Heals up to 5 party members over 7 seconds
